title: Article 2 - Medical Facility Construction
content:
Article 2 - Medical Facility Construction

State Regulations

Part 710 - Approval Of Medical Facility Construction (§ 710.1 to 710.13)

Part 711 - General Standards Of Construction (§ 711.1 to 711.10)

Part 712 - Standards Of Construction For General Hospital Facilities (Subpart 712-1 to 712-2)

Part 713 - Standards Of Construction For Nursing Home Facilities (Subpart 713-1 to 713-4)

Part 714 - Standards Of Construction For Adult Day Health Care Program Facilities (§ 714.1 to 714.4)

Part 715 - Standards Of Construction For Freestanding Ambulatory Care Facilities (Subpart 715-1 to 715-2)

Part 716 - Standards Of Construction For Rehabilitation Facilities (§ 716.1 to 716.6)

Part 717 - Standards of Construction for New Hospice Facilities and Units (§ 717.1 to 717.5)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
